remarks: Lemma for our Axiom of Infinity => standard Axiom of Infinity.  See ~ inf3 for detailed description.  In the proof, we invoke the Axiom of Regularity in the form of ~ zfreg .  (Contributed by NM, 29-Oct-1996.)
statement:
inf3lem.1 $e |- G = ( y e. _V |-> { w e. x | ( w i^i x ) C_ y } ) $.
inf3lem.2 $e |- F = ( rec ( G , (/) ) |` _om ) $.
inf3lem.3 $e |- A e. _V $.
inf3lem.4 $e |- B e. _V $.
inf3lem3 $p |- ( ( x =/= (/) /\ x C_ U. x ) -> ( A e. _om -> ( F ` A ) =/= ( F ` suc A ) ) ) $.
$d w x y $.
